data.name: Killbot General
data.detailed_description:
Lead your killbot army in satisfying 6-minute real-time tactics battles, as you lead your fully-customized faction through the campaign!

Real-time tactics, concentrated

  • Finding and attacking a weak spot...
  • Defending the right hill...
  • Ordering a bombardment to turn the tide of battle...
  • Sending reserves at just the right time, in the right place...
These are the tactical decisions that earned the greatest generals such as Caesar, Alexander, Napoleon their places in history.

Now it's your turn to showcase your tactical skills. Which troops to deploy, where and when to use artillery, which hills and valleys are worth going for, Killbot General fully focuses on these tactical decisions.

data.short_description: Satisfying real-time tactics packed in 6-minute battles. Nukes! Procedural roguelike campaign with wild customizations! Emphasis on strategy, not micromanagement or fast-clicking.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760, AMD Radeon R7 270X, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 470, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
